descriptionHtml:
The Aedric Emissaries - A Divine Race Mod

The Emissaries are the fragmented remains of the Aedra left behind after the creation of Mundas. They are formed from the holy shards cast off by the dieing Aedra long ago. They are revered within the temples of Tamriel and are treated with the utmost respect by the priests. They can call on their Aedric decent to heal those around them and to repel unholy beings such as the undead and Daedra.

If you would like to help me with this mod, please PM me with a link to your previous works. I'm mostly looking for people to do textures and models.

Racial Abilities

Starting Stats:
Health: 125
Magicka: 150
Stamina: 100

Starting Skills:
Restoration: 10
Speechcraft: 10
One-handed: 5
Light Armor: 5
Enchanting: 5

Starting Spells:
Aedric Blast: A holy blast that burns, freezes and electrocutes anything it touches, as well as turning the undead and causing them to flee.
Aedric Blood: Your Aedric blood grants you a golden tongue, increased regeneration in combat and makes you near-undetectable by mere mortals. SEMI-GLITCHED
Aedric Circle:  A circle of Aedric light that heals those within it and burns undead that enter it.
Aedric Healing: The Blessing of the Divines is channeled through your palm. Fully restores Health and Stamina and cures Poison and Disease as well as temporarily buffing you against the elements. NOT WORKING AT THE MOMENT

Unique Items:
-The Aedric Blade: The Aedric Blessings on this blade burn those it strikes and cause the undead to melt before it and flee.
-Aedric Robes: The Aedric Blessings on these boots allow the wearing to walk on water as if it were land.
-Aedric Boots: The Aedric Blessings on these robes massively increase the wearers natural health, magicka and stamina recovery, as well as increasing their Restorative abilities.

Changelog:
-V. 1-
--Initial Upload
-V. 1.1-
--Decreased charge time for Aedric Blast
--Placed the Aedric Artifacts Chest north of the Lady of the Lake
--Fiddled around with Aedric Healing. Hopefully working now
--Removed the Muffle effect from Aedric Blood.

Upcoming Features:
-Instant recognition within Temples
-Unique Models/Textures
-Followers
-More?

Known Issues-
-Aedric Blood is still glitchy
-Aedric Healing is not showing up at all
-Cannot reenchant items with the Aedric Enchants
author: Can1s_Major
